.  It is located at the southern end of Clear Lake, which is more than 1.5 million years old.

value: in September is a large gathering of seaplanes including floatplanes, flying boats, and other amphibious vehicles.
directions=3.5 miles northeast of Kelseyville on Soda Bay Road

content=A beautiful park on the largest natural lake entirely within California where you can fish, swim, boat, hike, and learn. The gift shop is a world in itself it has many taxidermy animals live fish teach the children about animals. The park has many trails to walk along that are very beautiful.
content=Mount Konocti is a beautiful and majestic sight. There are many resorts on the lake available, you can take a boat ride and enjoy a better view of the wonderful landscape.
content=Dance classes for children - the best little dance studio in Lake County!

If you come to beautiful Clearlake you have to stop by MainStreet Bar and Grill, the food is great, the service is fast, and the prices are affordable.

Come to Clearlake and enjoy Aroma's at Yuba College Clearlake Campus it is some of the best food for a college culinary class. It has awesome food and good prices.

In my opinion Cactus Grill is the best place to go for Mexican food. It is located on the corner of Lakeshore DR and Pearl street. Come and enjoy.

If you are ever in Clealake,Calif, you have to stop by the Main Street Cafe. This is one of our favorate resturants in town. They have the best burgers, and not to mention the baby back ribs, YUM. Main Stree Cafe is located right across the lake, on Lakeshore Blvd.

There are two restaurants in Clearlake that I recommend.  One is The Main Street Bar and Grill which serves a variety of food and the service is friendly.  The prices are reasonable and the food is very good.
There is also The Happy Garden Chinese restaurant located in Clearlake Oaks.
The prices are reasonable and the food is first rate!

Main Street Bar and Grill is a wonderful place to eat. The service is excellent and the food is yummy. Its located on lakeshore drive. My favorite item is their club sandwich.

If you come to Clearlake and want an awesome night out on the town go over to Silks Bar & Grill. It has great food, good entertainment, and great priced drinks. So come out and have some fun.

value: content=Blue Fish Cove welcomes you to escape to the peace and quiet of a lake shore mountain vacation. As you explore our web site you will learn of the many activities that a lake shore mountain vacation offers.
